items.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified weapons.
explicitMods: Can use Items requiring up to level 15
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Lightning is released from your hands four times in quick succession, damaging all enemies in an arc in front of you.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after using another skill or after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.
explicitMods: 15% more Area of Effect radius for each stage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.

items.secDescrText: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay. Enemies hit by the arrows are pinned in place, unable to move for a time.

items.secDescrText: Throws a trap that, when triggered by an enemy, converts that enemy to your side for a short duration. Does not affect unique monsters or players.

items.secDescrText: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. Only works with daggers, claws and one handed swords.

After a short duration, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers from this skill.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Attacks a target with physical and fire damage, causing balls of molten magma to launch forth from your weapon as you swing. These will explode, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.
explicitMods: 60% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Summons a totem that can consume nearby corpses. If you are hurt, it will destroy a corpse to leech life to you.
explicitMods: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
Leeches 50 Life to you for each corpse consumed
Leeches 17 Mana to you for each corpse consumed
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Summons a totem that has an aura which regenerates life for you and your nearby allies.
explicitMods: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Single-target Melee attacks deal Splash Damage to Surrounding Targets
items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Summons an icy shield that protects against physical and fire damage. It drains your mana while active and at a faster rate while you are moving. When you have no mana left, the skill turns off. While active, it leaves a trail of ground ice which lasts for a short duration.
explicitMods: Additional 138 Mana drained per second while moving
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: A sequence of ice crystals erupts from the ground around the caster, damaging enemies and leaving the ground chilled.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Perform a swift counter-attack against enemies in a cone shape when you block with your shield.
explicitMods: Counterattack with this Skill when you Block
You cannot use this Attack directly
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them take increased physical damage and degeneration.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 27% increased Physical damage
Cursed enemies take 33% increased damage from Damage Over Time effects
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Lightning is released from your hands four times in quick succession, damaging all enemies in an arc in front of you.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Spin and attack in place, damaging nearby enemies and pulling others towards you.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.
explicitMods: Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to 8% of the corpse's maximum Life

items.secDescrText: Casts a delayed teleport to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to.

items.secDescrText: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. For each hit you take, the shields cause a burst of flame, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

items.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it runs out of time and dissipates completely.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Damage enemies around you, then perform a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location.

items.secDescrText: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.

items.secDescrText: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc towards the target. Also does damage to other nearby monsters. Only works with Axes and Swords.

items.secDescrText: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon, and summons your double for a duration to continuously attack monsters in this fashion.

items.secDescrText: Summons a totem that casts a beam of fire at you and each other totem you control, dealing burning damage to enemies caught in the beam. Enemies near either end of a beam also suffer burning damage.
